titleInfo.title: Dataset describing RNA editing sites in the mitochondrial genome of 'Boerner' (Vitis riparia x Vitis cinerea)

mods.abstract: The dataset contains a table listing the RNA editing sites of the 'Börner' mitochondrial genome sequence (mt_Boe). In addition, coding sequences (CDS) and protein sequences from the mitochondrial genes subject to RNA editing (edited and not edited versions) are provided. The data belong to the study 'Genome sequences of both organelles of the grapevine rootstock cultivar ‘Börner’' which contains additional information about this dataset.
